vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.1.20;
son of: Elkanah (H0511H) and Hannah (H2584);
father of: Joel (H3100) and Abijah (H0029)
Also named: Samouēl<\i> (Σαμουήλ "Samuel" G4545)
§ Samuel = "his name is El"
1) son of Elkanah by his wife Hannah and judge or prophet of Israel during the days of Saul and David
2) son Ammihud and the prince of the tribe of Simeon who was chosen to divide the land of Canaan between the tribes. Spelled 'Shemuel'
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar. Spelled 'Shemuel'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Elcaná; profeta; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Amihud; jefe; tribu de Simeón; (c)   hijo de Tolá; tribu de Isacar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒母耳 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他的名是上帝"
1) 以利加拿和他的妻子哈拿的兒子. 他是掃羅和大衛時的士師或先知.
2) 亞米忽的兒子, 西緬支派的首領, 被撿選代表西緬支派參與分配迦
南地給各支派的工作. 名字拼作'示母利' ( #民 34:20| )
3) 陀拉的兒子, 以薩迦的孫子. 名字拼作'示母利' ( #代上 7:2| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒母耳 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他的名是上帝"
1) 以利加拿和他的妻子哈拿的儿子. 他是扫罗和大卫时的士师或先知.
2) 亚米忽的儿子, 西缅支派的首领, 被捡选代表西缅支派参与分配迦
南地给各支派的工作. 名字拼作'示母利' ( #民 34:20| )
3) 陀拉的儿子, 以萨迦的孙子. 名字拼作'示母利' ( #代上 7:2| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.34.20;
son of: Ammihud (H5989H)
§ Samuel = "his name is El"
1) son of Elkanah by his wife Hannah and judge or prophet of Israel during the days of Saul and David
2) son Ammihud and the prince of the tribe of Simeon who was chosen to divide the land of Canaan between the tribes. Spelled 'Shemuel'
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar. Spelled 'Shemuel'

A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.2;
son of: Tola (H8439);
brother of: Uzzi (H5813H), Rephaiah (H7509I), Jeriel (H3400), Jahmai (H3181) and Ibsam (H3005)
§ Samuel = "his name is El"
1) son of Elkanah by his wife Hannah and judge or prophet of Israel during the days of Saul and David
2) son Ammihud and the prince of the tribe of Simeon who was chosen to divide the land of Canaan between the tribes. Spelled 'Shemuel'
3) son of Tola and grandson of Issachar. Spelled 'Shemuel'
